channel.title: Looking for bug finder to test out my Beta server [Staff position guarunteed]
channel.description: Title says it all :) Its a delta based server running on the [Godz Corruptions] source, with a few things tweaked by me. It's not nearly complete, and I am 30% done coding it. But I need a bug tester to help me locate the bugs while I code! If they are helpful enough, they will probably get a staff position when the server is released! I only need 1 or 2 people to test, and if you decide to be a tester, post the username you will be using in game below. Enjoy! http://www.mediafire.com/?d94pdtgaysmu36i (Client)
